title: Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours      The Pierce Stocking Scenic Drive is a 7 mile scenic route that takes you to spectacular overlooks of Lake Michigan, Glen Lake, and the Sleeping Bear Dunes. Two picnic areas are also on the route. A brochure is available at the entrance to the drive for a self-guided tour which has 12 designated stops that are described in the brochure and on interpretive signs at the stops. Bus ToursIf you have a group on a bus tour, arrangements can be made to have a park ranger or volunteer give a commentary during your bus tour of the park. Contact park headquarters 231-326-4700, ext. 5010.  Reservations must be made at least two weeks in advance. Snowshoe Tours During the winter season (January through March), ranger-guided snowshoe hikes are offered. This is a very popular event each week, so be sure to call park headquarters 231-326-4700, ext. 5010 to make reservations. Learn more.
